Alexis Balayre

Full Stack Web3 Developer

My name is Alexis Balayre and I am a French full-stack developer specialized in Web3. I realize all the missions related to the creation of a decentralized application (DApp) from smart contracts to the user interface.

Education

  • ISEP - Engineering Master Degree

    2021 - 2024

    ISEP is a French digital engineering school located in Paris. I am currently specializing in data intelligence.

  • CVUT - Academic Semester Abroad

    Feb. 2021 - Jun. 2021

    Academic semester in English at the Czech Technical University in Prague.

  • ISEP - International Integrated Cycle

    2019 - 2021

    Preparatory years at the ISEP engineering school in Paris.

Experience

  • Vice President of the Blockchain Lab at Garage ISEP

    Sept. 2022 - Now

    Garage ISEP is the student association of ISEP dedicated to technology (Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence, ...). Organization of workshops and conferences to learn and master Blockchain technologies.

  • Blockchain Developer at CoinShares

    Sept. 2022 - Jan. 2023

    CoinShares is Europe's largest and oldest crypto asset investment company, managing billions of dollars in assets. Discovery of Decentralized Finance within the DeFi team and realization of missions to build a decentralized asset management tool.

  • Blockchain Developer at Sleepn

    May 2022 - Oct. 2023

    Sleepn is a decentralized sleep tracking application that allows you to earn money by sleeping. Sleepn won 2 prizes at the 2022 ETHGlobal HackMoney hackathon : "Polygon — Best App" and "Superfluid — Best Use With Another Partner".
